I act as a sales lead and also provide support to the general sales team around all audience targeting and programmatic solutions. For audience this includes both brand and performance campaigns that use data to target. Channels for programmatic revenues include programmatic buyers using a third party DSP as well as any buyers using Yahoo’s own buying platform. I also act as a sales lead for native advertising solutions for display advertisers. Vertical Sales Executive: Telco, Tech, Travel & Education Yahoo! April 2013  –  June 2014  (1 year 3 months) Milan Area, Italy As vertical exec I was in charge of the vertical’s key clients. I acted as their first and main contact for all Yahoo! solutions. My primary objectives were building/maintaining business relationships, evangelizing the market and growing overall key client vertical revenue for Yahoo! 
 
Tasks and Responsibilities: 
 
Key Client Management 
 
Key Client Revenue growth 
 
Market Evangelization 
 
To work in coordination with Yahoo! Agency leads and Agency account managers 
 
In depth knowledge of all Yahoo! products and solutions ( Display, Display Performance and Search) DR Specialist Yahoo! January 2012  –  March 2013  (1 year 3 months) Milan Area, Italy I was responsible for managing and developing key client accounts aiming to maximize revenue coming into Yahoo! through delivering the DR solution Yahoo! Offers (performance display advertising). I was the first port of call for salespeople who needed assistance with client pitches, and general DR support and broader DR evangelization. I worked closely with the local Sales team and Display & DR Marketplace teams (e.g. DR Analysts, DR Marketplace, Media Buying) dedicated to drive the Y! performance network with the ultimate objective of exceeding revenue targets and gaining market share. DR Analyst Yahoo! September 2010  –  January 2012  (1 year 5 months) Milan Area, Italy As a DR Analyst at Yahoo! I was part of the Y! Network DR Optimisation & Analysis team. I worked on performance advertising display campaigns running on the Yahoo! Direct Response (DR) network. While working in coordination with the Sales and Media buying teams, my objective was to effectively manage campaigns through maintaining client relationship, reaching client goals, growing accounts and generating new business. Junior Web Project Manager Elsevier January 2008  –  September 2010  (2 years 9 months) Junior web project manager working within the digital business solutions department.  
 
My responsibility was to oversee, implement, finalize or maintain short medium and long-term projects. I worked directly with the customer with whom I discussed and agreed on how to develop projects on the basis of a prefixed budget. 
 
Such projects were multi target web sites, portals and newsletters, customized on client needs using Elsevier editorial content. They could be integrated with specific electronic applications and printed supports.
